Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: A scroll with the Guild Council crest, for the purposes of filing a formal complaint for the consideration of the Guild Council.

Core:Properties.Core:Property:
X[S] \ \
\ \SkyWriter! Composing: \$[Describe(Obj(\$this), nil, nil, STYLE_NONPOSS)]\ \ \ \ \\$(msg)\\
\ \ \ \
\\\
Triskellian Guild Council Complaint Form\\\ \ \
\\\Name:\\\ \ \
\$[capitalize(Obj(\$actor)."skotos:charname")]\ \ \\\(First name only please)\\\ \ \
\\\ \
\\\ \
\\\ \
\\\Guild Affiliation:\\\ \ \ \ \\\(The group you are affiliated with, if any)\\\ \ \
\\\ \
\\\ \
\\\ \
\\\Nature of complaint: \\\ \ \ \ \\\(Road concerns, guild issues, issues with Council administration, etc.)\\\ \ \
\\\ \
\\\ \
\\\ \
\\\\Detailed explanation of the concern or complaint:\\\\ \ \
\ \ \\$[((\$r1 = Obj(\$this)."details:default:description:writing") ? replace_strings(\$r1, "\
", "\\n") : "")]\\ \ \ \
\ \
\ \ \\\ \ \ \ \ \ \ \$[Call(Obj(\$this), "write", \$actor: \$actor, \$this: \$this, \$id: \$id, \$guild: \$guild, \$title: \$title, \$body: \$body);] \ \ \ \
X[M] EmitTo(\$actor, "Offering me to someone?"); return TRUE;
